org.universAAL.lddi.knx.groupdevicecategory

Interface IKnxDpt1

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KnxDpt1GroupDevice, KnxDpt1Instance, KnxDpt1Instance

    public interface IKnxDpt1
    Base GroupDeviceCategory for KNX datapoint types B1 (1 bit). In general GroupDeviceCategories specify: - rules and interfaces needed for the communication between OSGi groupDevice service and driver service. Both of them (groupDevice and driver) implement this IF. - a set of service registration properties, their data types and semantics (mandatory or optional) - a range of match values
    Author:
    Thomas Fuxreiter (foex@gmx.at)
